      Property Details for 7436 Arrowood Rd

      Description provided by Trulia
      7436 Arrowood Rd This is a Single-Family Home located at 7436 Arrowood Road, Bethesda MD. 7436 Arrowood Rd has 3 ½ baths and approximately 3,680 square feet. The property was built in 1975. 7436 Arrowood Rd is in the 20817 ZIP code in Bethesda, MD. The average list price for ZIP code 20817 is $1,531,876.

The property was built in 1975. 7436 Arrowood Rd is in Bethesda and in ZIP Code 20817. The average sale price for 20817 sold homes is $1,001,697.
